content: Gather yourselves to flee from the midst of Jerusalem!
And set up a signal-fire in Beth Haccerem;
For disaster appears out of the north,
I have likened the daughter of Zion
To a lovely and delicate woman.
The shepherds with their flocks shall come to her.
They shall pitch  tents against her all around.
Each one shall pasture in his own place.‚Äù
For thus has the  of hosts said:
